ModMetaData.name: Yayo's Nature (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: YAYO
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of YAYOs mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2558409397
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr][td][url=https://dsc.gg/mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/YayosNature][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1][b]# The colony's biome changes every 60 days. (can edit in option)[/b][/h1] - Tile, Animals, plants, temperature change - Not destroy : Constructed floors, buildings, anima trees, sea, river, water(option)
[h1][b]# No lag[/b][/h1] - It runs smoothly with no lag. - Biomes! mod series may cause more lag than other mods when changing. - If you are experiencing lag, change the 'change tick' in the options to a larger number. (Instead, Map tiles take longer to change.)
[h1][b]# The entire map changes over about 12 days[/b][/h1] - This is a real play capture.
[img]https://imgur.com/wXaSiuh.png[/img]
[img]https://imgur.com/kDYv8uV.png[/img]
[h1][b]# mountain change(default : off, turn on in option)[/b][/h1] [img]https://imgur.com/1hLtpEX.png[/img]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfrw-AKo2Ax-TnDXNmhE28w] Yayo's Youtube[/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfrw-AKo2Ax-TnDXNmhE28w][img]https://imgur.com/vGVHUDk.png[/img][/url] The latest news about my mods are posted on YouTube. Subscribe to YouTube and be the first to know.
[h1][b]# Options[/b][/h1] - Turn off biomes you don't want.
[img]https://imgur.com/EXRUFRp.png[/img]
[h1][b]# Caution![/b][/h1] - This mod only supports map size 0x0 to 325x325. (max size in vanilla without devmode) - Only biomes that exist on the world map (planet) can appear randomly. - When adding a biome mod, it automatically regenerates the planet's biome distribution. (can be turned off in options)
[h1][b]# Recommand Mod[/b][/h1]
- Swimming Kit https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1542399915
- Alpha Biomes https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1841354677
- Advanced Biomes (Continued) https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2052116426
[b]Please take this mod and modify it. The source code is included. I'd love to see variations come out with various ideas.[/b]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/3006875291][img]https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/emipa606/YayosNature?label=latest%20version&style=plastic&color=9f1111&labelColor=black[/img][/url] | tags: biome options, planet modifications
